attributes.action: call a general election when he stands down, to allow the public to elect their leader.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea of Gordon Brown or any other Labour MP assuming the role of Prime minister automatically is distasteful in a democracy. Once the current PM stands down the public should be given the chance to vote for their leader directly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
